name: AlpineAire Sweet & Sour Pork
description: Tangy sweet and sour pork that rivals your favourite take-out, fortune cookies not included.Packaging clearly shows allergens and nutritional information, and has a graduated scale on one side, so you know how much water to add.Ingredients: white rice, freeze dried pulled pork (natural flavors, salt), honey powder (honey, corn maltodextrin), pineapple, brown sugar crystals (cane sugar, cane molasses or brown cane sugar (cane sugar, cane molasses), soy sauce [(wheat, soybeans, salt) maltodextrin, salt], bell pepper red & green combo, potato starch, food starch-modified, chicken flavor broth low sodium [maltodextrin, salt, torula yeast, dehydrated vegetables (onion, celery, parsley, spinach, garlic, carrot), potato flour, xanthan gum, spices, extractives of spice (including turmeric and paprika), soy lecithin.  not more than 2% soybean oil added as a processing aid], white onion, peas, natural vinegar flavor (maltodextrin, silicon dioxide, and natural flavor), ginger, garlic granulated, teriyaki sauce [soy sauce (fermented soybeans, wheat and salt), salt, maltodextrin, salt, yeast extract, spices, onion powder, garlic powder], natural pineapple flavor (maltodextrin, silicon dioxide, natural flavor, and tricalcium phosphate), white onion, natural flavor (baker’s yeast extract, salt, canola oil).Allergens: contains soy and wheat.No cooking needed, simply add water, stir, wait and enjoy.Meals have a 5-year shelf life.
